poem:
### Swedish Silence

Beneath the blare—
Trump's stage glows false.
Stolen notes of "Dancing  
Queen"—

Money, Money  
mingled with defeat.

Minnesota's  
winds whisper  
harmony

ABBA's echo  
demands the quiet.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Abba demand Trump campaign stop using their music at rallies Abba have demanded that Donald Trump stop using their music after the former US president played several of their songs and used footage of the group at a campaign rally. The Republican presidential candidate played hits including Money, Money, Money, The Winner Takes It All and Dancing Queen at his event in St Cloud, Minnesota, the US state with the highest Swedish population, on Tuesday,". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Abba demand Trump campaign stop using their music at rallies Abba have demanded that Donald Trump stop using their music after the former US president played several of their songs and used footage of the group at a campaign rally.
